text: If Loving You Is Wrong is an American primetime television soap opera, created, executive produced, written and directed by Tyler Perry. The show premiered September 9, 2014, on the Oprah Winfrey Network. If Loving You Is Wrong is loosely based on Perry's 2014 film, The Single Moms Club. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2014–16)=== ===Season 2 (2016–17)=== ===Season 3 (2017–18)=== ===Season 4 (2019)=== ===Season 5 (2020)=== ==Ratings== ==References== ==External links== * Episodes of If Loving You Is Wrong on TV Guide Category:Lists of American drama television series episodes Category:Lists of soap opera episodes
